tool_description: Analyzes wallet credentials to detect which blockchain networks are supported and identifies existing addresses with transaction history across multiple chains.

credential_type.description: Type of credential: mnemonic, private_key, master_key

credential_data.description: The credential data (seed phrase, private key, etc.)

chains_to_check.description: Array of blockchain networks to check

check_activity.description: Check for existing activity on detected addresses

error_messages: Invalid credential type: Must be one of [mnemonic, private_key, master_key].
Invalid credential data: Credential data format is invalid or corrupted.
Unsupported blockchain: One or more chains in chains_to_check are not supported.
Derivation failed: Unable to derive addresses for one or more blockchain networks.
usage: Provide credential_type and credential_data, optionally specify chains_to_check and check_activity. Returns supported chains and activity status.

supported_chains.description: Array of blockchain networks supported by the credential

active_chains.description: Array of chains with existing transaction activity

derived_addresses.description: JSON string mapping chains to their derived addresses

total_chains_found.description: Total number of supported blockchain networks
